thread.title: Here's how Harry Styles' gal-pal Caroline dated Prince Harry
thread.title_full: Here's how Harry Styles' ex gal-pal Caroline dated Prince Harry - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Here's how Harry Styles' gal-pal Caroline dated Prince Harry
text:
*Washington D.C., Oct.12 (ANI): X Factor U.K. host Caroline Flack has recently spilled the beans on her rumoured romance with Prince Harry.*
Washington D.C., Oct.12 (ANI): X Factor U.K. host Caroline Flack has recently spilled the beans on her rumoured romance with Prince Harry. In her new autobiography, 'Storm in a C Cup', the 35-year-old T.V presenter said she and the 31-year-old royal got close after meeting through a mutual pal. However, she added that they decided to end their relationship after it went public, People magazine reports. According to an excerpt from the host's upcoming autobiography, The 'Strictly Come Dancing' and the younger son of Charles, Prince of Wales spent the evening "chatting and laughing". In addition, Flack, who previously dated Harry Styles, also admitted that the two were friends. However, their friendship could not survive long and ended quickly.(ANI) Â»
